title: GetExceptionEntry (Method)
text:
METHOD GetExceptionEntry : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets a entry with index nIndex of the Exception_Schedule-Property of this BACnet-Object. The returned data (pSpecialEvt) is
allocated by the stack and therefore has to be freed after usage using
FreeStackAllocatedMemory
again!

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the exception entry to get.

rows.Name: pSpecialEvt
rows.Comment:
The returned Pointer gets filled with the data of IEC_BACNET_EVENT_PARAMETER AND (!) the data referenced within evtParams.
After usage, useFreeStackAllocatedMemory, to free the used memory again.
